value.name: Study: Half of workers lack direction in their career
value.description: Melissa Venable is an education advisor who told CBS 17 the struggle for some people is to understand the skills most needed by employers, no matter the field.

value.name: Ankle monitor helps Charlotte police solve robberies FBI says | Charlotte Observer
value.description: But it’s what the gunman’s accused accomplice wore that proved pivotal: an electronic-monitoring device. That allowed Charlotte-Mecklenburg police to put a robbery suspect they previously identified as Terrence White within shouting distance of both crimes and break open the case,

value.name: Liberate the Caged Voices
value.description: Building the revolution. Jalil Muntaqim speaks with SF Bay View Editor Nube Brown and informs, inspires and enlightens about New Afrikan identity, (r)evolution and humanity.
